data "RemoveEvents" "OnSourceStatusApplied"
data "RemoveConditions" "HasStatus('STATUS_RESOLVED_Projectile_ChromaticOrb_Lightning',context.Source)"
data "OnRemoveFunctors" "IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):UseSpell(Target_Spellbinder_Bound_Projectile_ChromaticOrb_Lightning,true,true,true);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):RemoveStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Projectile_ChromaticOrb_Lightning)"

type "PassiveData"
using "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_BasePassive"
data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Projectile_ChromaticOrb_Lightning);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Projectile_ChromaticOrb_Lightning,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),STATUS_SPELLBINDER_BOUND_SPELL_REMOVER,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source) and HasPassive('Spellbinder_SpellDancer_MagicalArc_Marker', context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

data "OnRemoveFunctors" "IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):UseSpell(Target_Spellbinder_Bound_Target_Longstrider,true,true,true);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):RemoveStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_Longstrider)"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator;IgnoreResting"

type "StatusData"

new entry "STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_Blindness_3"
type "StatusData"
data "StatusType" "BOOST"
data "RemoveEvents" "OnSourceStatusApplied"
data "RemoveConditions" "HasStatus('STATUS_RESOLVED_Target_Blindness_3',context.Source)"
data "OnRemoveFunctors" "IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):UseSpell(Target_Spellbinder_Bound_Target_Blindness_3,true,true,true);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):RemoveStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_Blindness_3)"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator;IgnoreResting"

new entry "STATUS_RESOLVED_Target_Blindness_3"
type "StatusData"
data "StatusType" "BOOST"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator;IgnoreResting"

new entry "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_Target_Blindness_3"
type "PassiveData"
using "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_BasePassive"
data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_Blindness_3);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_Blindness_3,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),STATUS_SPELLBINDER_BOUND_SPELL_REMOVER,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source) and HasPassive('Spellbinder_SpellDancer_MagicalArc_Marker', context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

new entry "Passive_Trigger_Target_Blindness_3"
type "PassiveData"
using "Spellbinder_Passive_Trigger_BasePassive"
data "StatsFunctors" "ApplyStatus(STATUS_RESOLVED_Target_Blindness_3,100,0)"

data "Properties" "UseSpell(SWAP,Target_Spellbinder_Bound_Target_Blindness_3,true,true,true,,true);ApplyStatus(OBSERVER_OBSERVER,STATUS_SPELLBINDER_BOUND_ARMOR_REMOVER,100,0)"
data "DisplayName" "h20eb5d03g4ecag4090g87c8gb62579a95526;1"

using "Shout_Spellbinder_Bind_Target_Blindness"
data "PowerLevel" "4"
data "RootSpellID" "Shout_Spellbinder_Bind_Target_Blindness"
data "SpellProperties" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_OFFHAND_BINDING') and HasWeaponInMainHand()):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,MainHand,TAGBOUNDSPELL_3_Target_Blindness_4,100,-1);IF(HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_OFFHAND_BINDING') and not (WieldingWeapon('Melee', true, false, context.Source) or WieldingWeapon('Ammunition', true, false, context.Source))):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,MainHand,TAGBOUNDSPELL_3_Target_Blindness_4,100,-1);IF(HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_OFFHAND_BINDING') and (WieldingWeapon('Melee', true, false, context.Source) or WieldingWeapon('Ammunition', true, false, context.Source))):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,OffHand,TAGBOUNDSPELL_3_Target_Blindness_4,100,-1);"

data "TooltipDamageList" ""

data "RemoveEvents" "OnSourceStatusApplied"
data "RemoveConditions" "HasStatus('STATUS_RESOLVED_Target_HoldPerson_3',context.Source)"
data "OnRemoveFunctors" "IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):UseSpell(Target_Spellbinder_Bound_Target_HoldPerson_3,true,true,true);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):RemoveStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_HoldPerson_3)"

new entry "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_Target_HoldPerson_3"
type "PassiveData"
using "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_BasePassive"
data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_HoldPerson_3);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_HoldPerson_3,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),STATUS_SPELLBINDER_BOUND_SPELL_REMOVER,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source) and HasPassive('Spellbinder_SpellDancer_MagicalArc_Marker', context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

data "OnRemoveFunctors" "IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):UseSpell(Target_Spellbinder_Bound_Target_Levitate_4,true,true,true);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):RemoveStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_Levitate_4)"

data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_Levitate_4);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_Levitate_4,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),STATUS_SPELLBINDER_BOUND_SPELL_REMOVER,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source) and HasPassive('Spellbinder_SpellDancer_MagicalArc_Marker', context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Projectile_RayOfEnfeeblement);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Projectile_RayOfEnfeeblement,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),STATUS_SPELLBINDER_BOUND_SPELL_REMOVER,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source) and HasPassive('Spellbinder_SpellDancer_MagicalArc_Marker', context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_Fly);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_Fly,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),STATUS_SPELLBINDER_BOUND_SPELL_REMOVER,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source) and HasPassive('Spellbinder_SpellDancer_MagicalArc_Marker', context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

type "StatusData"
data "StatusType" "BOOST"
data "RemoveEvents" "OnSourceStatusApplied"
data "RemoveConditions" "HasStatus('STATUS_RESOLVED_Target_Haste_5',context.Source)"
data "OnRemoveFunctors" "IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):UseSpell(Target_Spellbinder_Bound_Target_Haste_5,true,true,true);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):RemoveStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_Haste_5)"

type "PassiveData"

data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_Haste_5);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_Haste_5,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),STATUS_SPELLBINDER_BOUND_SPELL_REMOVER,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source) and HasPassive('Spellbinder_SpellDancer_MagicalArc_Marker', context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

type "StatusData"

data "RemoveEvents" "OnSourceStatusApplied"
data "RemoveConditions" "HasStatus('STATUS_RESOLVED_Target_Invisibility_Greater',context.Source)"
data "OnRemoveFunctors" "IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):UseSpell(Target_Spellbinder_Bound_Target_Invisibility_Greater,true,true,true);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):RemoveStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_Invisibility_Greater)"

type "PassiveData"

data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_Invisibility_Greater);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_Invisibility_Greater,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),STATUS_SPELLBINDER_BOUND_SPELL_REMOVER,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source) and HasPassive('Spellbinder_SpellDancer_MagicalArc_Marker', context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_Contagion_FleshRot);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_Contagion_FleshRot,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),STATUS_SPELLBINDER_BOUND_SPELL_REMOVER,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source) and HasPassive('Spellbinder_SpellDancer_MagicalArc_Marker', context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_Contagion_Mindfire_6);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_Contagion_Mindfire_6,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),STATUS_SPELLBINDER_BOUND_SPELL_REMOVER,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source) and HasPassive('Spellbinder_SpellDancer_MagicalArc_Marker', context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_Contagion_SlimyDoom);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_Contagion_SlimyDoom,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),STATUS_SPELLBINDER_BOUND_SPELL_REMOVER,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source) and HasPassive('Spellbinder_SpellDancer_MagicalArc_Marker', context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"
